result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

PLEA:

17CF1274 - Ct. 4 (Felony BJ)>> NO CONTEST

17CF1370 - Ct. 4 (Obstructing)>>NO CONTEST


COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made,  a factual basis & def guilty.
Defendant makes statement.

COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/held on all counts listed above; 4 years probation on each count, concurrent.
CONDITIONS>>  Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; Safe Program Intake/assessment and follow up on any recommendations; AODA and any follow up; Absolute sobriety; FTE/FT schooling or combination thereof; Contact with any victims only as approved by PO; CC on each file including 3 domestic abuse surcharges; DNA surcharge (sample already given); Probation Review Hearing must be scheduled; 1 year MCJ, with last 60 days I&S to be used for rules violations, w/huber for work/treatment if defendant qualifies under jail classification system; 30 hours CS I&S to be used for rules violations.

Probation Review Hearing scheduled for 8/17/18 at 1:15pm

CREDIT for time served as follows:
15CM2448>>NO credit
15CF924>>9 days credit
18CF229>>122 days credit
17CF1370>>81 days credit
17CF1274>>56 days credit
